happy_box.enter_sign_in_code: Please enter the student ID or employee ID
happy_box.choose_first_letter: Please choose the first letter of first name
happy_box.challenge_section_description_1: The vibrant spirit of Tet, brimming with the colors of spring, has filled every corner of Wellspring Saigon! This is the perfect time for every WISers to pause, reflect on the past year refresh themselves, spread the love, and create meaningful Tet memories.
happy_box.challenge_section_description_2_3: ? - A journey to capture radiant moments, embracing the festive essence of Well-Spring Festival 2025 - Happy Home Grows My Spring!
happy_box.challenge_section_description_3: Get your best angles ready and join us in welcoming a truly unforgettable Tet season.
happy_box.video_section_gift_description_4: will receive gifts from the Organizers
happy_box.video_section_countdown_description_3: See you WISers at the upcoming Well-Spring Festival on
happy_box.thankyou_modal_description_2: You have completed the Tet challenge.
happy_box.thankyou_modal_description_3: Wishing WISer a new year full of joy and happiness

happy_run.form_description_2: Please register for the event with the information below.

form.section_2_heading: FOR STUDENTS / TEACHERS / STAFF AT WELLSPRING SAIGON

form.payment_success_heading:
YOU HAVE SUCCESSFULLY REGISTERED
FOR THE EVENT HAPPY RUN 2025
form.payment_success_qr_guide: Please make the payment using the QR code below
form.payment_success_desc_1: A successful registration email will be sent to your email address.
form.payment_success_desc_2: Thank you very much and see you at the Happy Run 2025 event!

NOTICE
REGISTRATION FOR

entry_categories.talent_placeholder: Please fill in the competition category (circus, martial arts, ...)

form.entry_participants_placeholder: Full name (required); class, department (if any). Example: Nguyen Van A – Class 8.8
form.entry_file_invalid: Please upload a valid file (mp3, mp4, mov, wmv, avi)
form.mobile_number_desc: *Note: Phone number of parent or accompanying adult
form.footer_note_1: 1. Contestants registering for Round 1 must complete the registration form before 5:00 PM on 23/11/2025.
form.footer_note_2: 2. The performance schedule for each act will be updated on the event website on 24/11/2025.
form.footer_note_3: 3. Contestants must arrive 15 minutes before the performance time for attendance and preparation.
form.footer_note_4: 4. Round 1 performances should not exceed 3 minutes and must showcase skills, talent, and the main content of the work.
form.success_text_1: Thank you for registering for WISers’ Greatest Show 2025!
form.success_text_2: Your registration information has been successfully recorded and sent to your registered email address.​
form.success_text_3: The Organizing Committee will review and approve your submission in the coming days.​
form.success_text_4: Please stay tuned for updates via email or the school’s official communication channels.
form.success_text_5: See you at ROUND 1 – “WITHIN ME” on November 29, 2025. ​Get ready to shine and showcase your unique talent! ​
form.submit_note: By clicking the “REGISTER” button, you confirm that you have read and agree to the regulations and terms of participation in the WISers’ Greatest Show 2025 competition on the event website.

program_status.not_opened_message:
Registration will open on the countdown date and time above.
Please check back then to register for WISers' Greatest Show 2025!
program_status.expired_message:
We're sorry, but registration for WISers' Greatest Show 2025 has ended.
Thank you for your interest! Stay tuned for future events.
